code.description: Should be a descriptive code that the expedition can be identified by. Example Framstrait2014.

type.description: Defines what the nature of the expedition is. Options are cruise, field work, traverse, etc...

summary.description: A free text explaining the area of operation and any specifics about the expedition.

topics.description: A list of one or more npolar topics identifying the subject matter of the expedition.

platforms.description: A list containing the vehicles/vessels used for the expedition.

type.description: The type of platform being used.

name.description: The name of the vessel or vehicle. Example 'RV Lance.'

activity.description: list of activite periods for the platform

departed.description: The date and time the expedition departed.

returned.description: The date and time the expedition returned.

departure_placename.description: The placename of the departure location.

return_placename.description: The placename of the return location.

people.description: List of people participating on the cruise.

organisations.description: List of organisations that are connected to the expedition.

links.description: A list of links relevant to this perticular expedition. This should include links to the project(s) and expedition track(s). After completion it can also include links to datasets collected or updated during this expedition.

locations.description: A list of one or more Geographic locations relevant to the expedition.

events.description: A list of events that occured during the expedition. This can include landfall, measurement stations etc...

tags.description: A list of one or more free text keywords describing the cruise.

progress.description: The progression state of the expedition.

draft.description: The publication state of the document.

collection.description: The storage collection the document belongs to.

comment.description: A free text comment for anything of importance to the expedition description.

changes.description: List the author can use to describe changes made to this description document

created.description: The date the document was created.

updated.description: The date the document was last updated.

created_by.description: The username of the person who first created the document in the system.

updated_by.description: The username of the person who last updated the document in the system.

_attachments.description: Internal object used to store and track attachments.
